valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Thu 6 Nov 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 7 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 994 moving slowly east, losing its identity by midnight tonight. New lows expected Bailey 991 and 150 miles west of Shannon 983 by same time
